eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray} \vert B \rangle_{X^0}
&=& f (\widehat{x}^0) \vert 0 \rangle +
g(\widehat{x}^0) \alpha^0_{-1} \overline{\alpha}^0_{-1} \vert 0
\rangle \nn
&+& \left[ h_1 (\widehat{x}^0) \alpha^0_{-2}
\overline{\alpha}^0_{-2} + h_2(\widehat{x}^0) (\alpha^0_{-1})^2
(\overline{\alpha}^0_{-1})^2 + h_3(\widehat{x}^0) \left(
(\alpha^0_{-1})^2 \overline{\alpha}^0_{-2} + \alpha^0_{-2}
(\overline{\alpha}^0_{-1})^2 \right) \right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn
&+& \cdots \label{b0}\\
\vert N \rangle_{X^i} &=& \exp \left( -
\sum_{n=1}^\infty {1 \over n} \alpha^i_{-n}
\overline{\alpha}^i_{-n} \right) \vert 0 \rangle \quad \qquad
(i=1, \cdots, 25) \nn
%
\vert {\rm ghost} \rangle &=& \exp \left( - \sum_{n=1}^\infty
\left(\overline{b}_{-n} c_{-n} + b_{-n} \overline{c}_{-n}\right)
\right) (c_0 + \overline{c}_0) c_1 \overline{c}_1 \vert 0 \rangle
\ . \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} \vert B \rangle_\pm &=& f^\pm(\wht, \whx) \vert 0 \rangle \nn
%
&+& {1 \over 2} g^\pm(\wht, \whx) ( \alpha^0_{-1} \pm i
\alpha^1_{-1} )( \overline{\alpha}^0_{-1} \pm i
\overline{\alpha}^1_{-1}) \vert 0 \rangle \nn
%
&+& {1 \over 4} h_1^\pm (\wht, \whx) (\alpha^0_{-2} \pm i
\alpha^1_{-2} ) (\overline{\alpha}^0_{-2} \pm i
\overline{\alpha}^1_{-2} ) \vert 0 \rangle \nn
%
&+& {1 \over 8} h_2^\pm(\wht, \whx) (\alpha^0_{-1} \pm i
\alpha^1_{-1})^2 ( \overline{\alpha}^0_{-1} \pm i
\overline{\alpha}^1_{-1} )^2 \vert 0 \rangle \nn
%
&+& {i \over 4} h_3^\pm (\wht, \whx) \left[ (\alpha^0_{-1} \pm i
\alpha^1_{-1})^2 (\overline{\alpha}^0_{-2} \pm i
\overline{\alpha}^1_{-2} ) + (\alpha^0_{-2} \pm i \alpha^1_{-2})
(\overline{\alpha}^0_{-1} \pm i \overline{\alpha}^1_{-1})^2
\right] \vert 0 \rangle \nn &+& \cdots  \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} f^\pm (x^0, x^1) &=& \left(1 + e^{+{x^0 \pm i x^1\over
\sqrt{2}}} \sin (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi /2) \right)^{-1} + \left(
1 + e^{-{x^0 \pm i x^1\over \sqrt{2} }} \sin (\widetilde{\lambda}
\pi/2) \right)^{-1} - 1, \label{fpm} \\
%
g^\pm (x^0, x^1) &=& 2\cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2 ) - f^\pm
(x^0, x^1), \label{gfromf} \\
%
h^\pm_1(x^0, x^1) &=& 2\cos^2 (\wt{\lambda} \pi/2) - 2 \sin
(\wt{\lambda} \pi/2) \cos^2 (\wt{\lambda} \pi/2) \cosh
\left({x^0\pm i x^1 \over \sqrt{2}}\right) -  f^\pm(x^0, x^1), \nn
%
h^\pm_2(x^0, x^1) &=& 4 \sin(\wt{\lambda} \pi/2) \cos^2
(\wt{\lambda} \pi/2) \cosh \left({x^0 \pm i x^1 \over
\sqrt{2}}\right) + f^\pm(x^0, x^1), \nn
%
h^\pm_3(x^0, x^1) &=& - 2 \sin (\wt{\lambda} \pi/2) \cos^2
(\wt{\lambda} \pi/2) \sinh \left({x^0 \pm i x^1 \over \sqrt{2}}
\right). \label{h3}\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&F = \vert\vert f^+ \vert\vert^2, \nn
%
&&G_{00} = - G_{11} = {\rm Re} (f^+ g^-),~~~ G_{01} = +G_{10}= {\rm Im} (f^+ g^-),\nn
%
&&G_{ij} = - \vert\vert f^+\vert\vert^2 \delta_{ij} \qquad ({\rm
for}~~i,j = 2, 3, \cdots, 25), \label{FG} \

\begin{eqnarray}
% \lim_{\epsilon \rightarrow \pm 0} \left( {1 \over x + i
%\epsilon} - {1 \over x - i \epsilon} \right) &=& \mp 2 \pi i \,
%\delta(x), \nn
\lim_{\beta \rightarrow 1 \mp 0} \left( {1 \over 1 +
\beta\, e^{i x/\sqrt{2}}}+{1 \over 1+\beta\, e^{-ix/\sqrt{2}}} \right) &=& 1
\pm 2\sqrt{2}\pi \sum_{n\in\Z} \delta \l(x-\sqrt{2}(2n+1)\pi\r),
\label{formula0} \

\begin{eqnarray} \int_0^{2\sqrt{2}\pi} \d x^1\, {1 \over 1 + \alpha\, e^{\pm i x^1/\sqrt{2}}} =
\left\{ \begin{array}{ccc} 0 & {\rm for} & \vert \alpha \vert > 1
\\ 2\sqrt{2} \pi & {\rm for} & \vert \alpha \vert < 1 \end{array} \right. .
\label{formula1} \

\begin{eqnarray} T_{ab}(x^0, x^1) = \frac{{\cal T}_{25}}{2} \left(
G_{ab}(x^0, x^1) - \eta_{ab} F(x^0, x^1) \right).
%\label{enemom}
\nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} T_{00} = - T_{11}  &=& {\cal T}_{25} \cos^2
(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2) \, {\rm Re} f^+ (x^0, x^1), \nn T_{01}
= +T_{10}  &=& {\cal T}_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi /2) \,
{\rm Im} f^+(x^0, x^1), \nn T_{ii} &=&-\cT_{25}||f^+(x^0,x^1)||^2
\qquad ({\rm for}~~~i=2,3,\cdots,25). \label{em-components} \

\begin{eqnarray} \langle E \rangle (x^0) &:=& {1 \over 2\sqrt{2} \pi}
\int_0^{2\sqrt{2}\pi}dx^1 \, T_{00} (x^0,x^1) =\left\{
\begin{array}{ccc} 0 & {\rm for} & \vert x^0 \vert > x_c^0 \\
{\cal T}_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) & {\rm for} & \vert x^0 \vert < x_c^0
\end{array} \right. .

\nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} H_{00} + i H_{01} = -H_{11}+i H_{10}=
 f^+ h_1^- \ . \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray} f^+ h_1^- = 2 \cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2) \left[1- 2
\sin (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi /2) \cosh {(x^0 - i x^1) \over
\sqrt{2}} \right] f^+ - \vert \vert f^+\vert\vert^2 \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} F^e(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} F(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn
G^e_{ab}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1} G
\Lambda \right)_{ab} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn
%
H^e_{ab}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1} H
\Lambda \right)_{ab} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn
%
I^e_{abcd}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1}
\left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1} I \Lambda \right)_{ac} \Lambda
\right)_{bd} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} F^e(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} F (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn &=&
\gamma^{-1} \vert\vert f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\vert\vert^2, \nn
%
G^e_{00}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma \left[G_{00}(\gamma^{-1} y^0,y^1) -
e^2 G_{22}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \right] \nn &=& - \gamma^{-1}
\vert\vert f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\vert\vert^2 + \, 2 \gamma
 \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda \pi /2)\, {\rm Re} f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0, y^1),
\nn
%
G^e_{11} (y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} G_{11}(\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1)\nn &=&+\gamma^{-1} \vert \vert f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)
\vert\vert^2 - 2 \gamma^{-1}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda \pi/2) \, {\rm Re}
f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
 G^e_{22}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma
\left[G_{22}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) - e^2 G_{00}(\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1) \right] \nn &=& - \gamma^{-1} \vert\vert f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0,
y^1)\vert\vert^2 - 2 \gamma e^2 \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \, {\rm Re}
f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0, y^1), \nn
%
G^e_{ii}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} G_{ii} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\nn
&=& -\gamma^{-1} \vert \vert f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \vert\vert^2
\qquad ({\rm for}~~~ i = 3, \cdots, 25),
 \nn
%
G^e_{02}(y^0, y^1) = - G^e_{20}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma e \left[
G_{00} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) - G_{22}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)
\right] \nn &=& 2 \gamma e \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda \pi/2 ) \, {\rm Re}
f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
 G^e_{01}(y^0, y^1) = + G^e_{10}(y^0,
y^1) &=& \, G_{01}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) = \,\, 2
\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \, {\rm Im} f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0, y^1), \nonumber
\nn
%
G^e_{12}(y^0, y^1) = - G^e_{21}(y^0, y^1) &=& e G_{01}(\gamma^{-1}
y^0, y^1) = 2e\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \, {\rm Im} f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} H_{00}^e(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma \left[ H_{00} - e^2 H_{22}
\right] = +\gamma \left[{\rm Re} (f^+ h_1^-) + e^2 \vert \vert f^+
\vert \vert^2 \right](\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{11}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} H_{11} = - \gamma^{-1} {\rm Re}
(f^+ h_1^-)(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{22} (y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma \left[ H_{22} - e^2 H_{00} \right]
= -\gamma \left[e^2 {\rm Re} (f^+ h_1^-) + \vert \vert f^+ \vert
\vert^2 \right] (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1),\nn
%
H_{ii}^e (y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} H_{ii} =
-\gamma^{-1} \vert \vert f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\vert \vert^2
\qquad ({\rm for}~~~i = 3, \cdots, 25), \nn
%
H^e_{01}(y^0, y^1) = + H^e_{10}(y^0, y^1) &=& \, H_{01} = \,\,
{\rm Im} (f^+ h_1^-)(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{12}(y^0, y^1) = - H^e_{21}(y^0, y^1) &=& e H_{01} = e\, {\rm
Im} (f^+ h_1^-)(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{02}(y^0, y^1) = - H^e_{20}(y^0, y^1) &=& e \gamma
\left[H_{00} - H_{22} \right] = e \gamma \left[ {\rm Re} (f^+
h_1^-) + \vert \vert f^+ \vert \vert^2 \right](\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} T^e_{ab}(y^0, y^1) = {{\cal T}_{25} \over 2} \left(
G^e_{(ab)}(y^0, y^1) - \eta_{ab} F^e (y^0, y^1) \right), \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray} T^e_{00}(y^0, y^1) &=& + \, {\cal T}_{25} \gamma \,

%
T^e_{22} (y^0, y^1) &=& - {\cal T}_{25} e^2 \gamma \cos^2

- {\cal T}_{25} \gamma^{-1}
|| f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) ||^2, \nn
%

||f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)||^2 \qquad
({\rm for}~~~ i = 3, \cdots, 25).
\label{Te}
\

 {\cal Q}_{[02]}(y^0, y^1) &=& {\cal T}_{25} \gamma e \cos^2(

\nn
%

\begin{eqnarray} T_{00}^{e+b}&=& + \cT_{25} \gamma \widetilde{\gamma} (1 +
b^2)\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\, {\rm Re}f^+,\nn
%
T_{01}^{e+b} &=& + \cT_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\left[{\rm Im}f^+ +
\gamma \wt\gamma eb\,{\rm Re}f^+ \right], \nn
%
T_{11}^{e+b} &=& - \cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\left[ \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} (1 - e^2)\,{\rm Re}f^+ -{2eb \over (1 +
b^2)}\,{\rm Im} f^+ \right],\nn
%
 T^{e+b}_{22} &=&  + \cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)
\left[ \gamma \widetilde{\gamma} (b^2 - e^2) \,{\rm Re}f^+ + {2 eb
\over (1 + b^2)}\,{\rm Im}f^+ \right] - \cT_{25}
\gamma^{-1}\wt{\gamma}^{-1}|| f^+||^2,\nn
 T_{ii}^{e+b} &=& -\cT_{25}
\gamma^{-1} \wt{\gamma}^{-1} ||f^+ ||^2 \qquad \qquad ({\rm
for}~~~i = 3, \cdots, 25), \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} {\cal Q}_{[02]}^{e+b} &=& \cT_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \left[
\gamma \wt{\gamma} e \,{\rm Re}f^+ - b \,{\rm Im}f^+ \right], \nn
%
{\cal Q}_{[12]}^{e+b} &=& \cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \left[
 e \left({ 1 - b^2 \over 1+ b^2} \right)\,{\rm Im}f^+
+\gamma\wt{\gamma} b \,{\rm Re}f^+  \right], \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} T_{00}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& \, \, \Gamma^2 \, \left( 2\sqrt{2}\pi
\wh E \, \delta (y^0, y^1) \right) \, = - \, \Gamma^2 \,
T_{22}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) \nn
%
T_{01}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=&\Gamma^2 \, V \left( 2\sqrt{2}\pi \wh E \,
\delta(y^0, y^1) \right) \, = \, V \, T_{00}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) \nn
%
T_{11}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& \Gamma^2 V^2 \left( 2\sqrt{2}\pi \wh E \,
\delta (y^0, y^1) \right) = V^2 T_{00}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) \nn
T^{e+b}_{22}(y^0, y^1) &=&-2\sqrt{2}\pi \wh E\, \delta (y^0, y^1) \nn
{\cal Q}_{[02]}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& 2\sqrt{2}\pi\wh E\,\Gamma\,\delta
(y^0, y^1)\nn {\cal Q}_{[12]}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& 2\sqrt{2}\pi\wh
EV\Gamma\,\delta (y^0, y^1) = V {\cal Q}^{e+b}_{[02]}(y^0, y^1) \
. \nonumber \

\\ 2\sqrt{2} \pi & {\rm for} & \vert \alpha \vert < 1 \end{array} \right. .
\label{formula1} \

\begin{eqnarray} T_{ab}(x^0, x^1) = \frac{{\cal T}_{25}}{2} \left(
G_{ab}(x^0, x^1) - \eta_{ab} F(x^0, x^1) \right).
%\label{enemom}
\nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} T_{00} = - T_{11}  &=& {\cal T}_{25} \cos^2
(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2) \, {\rm Re} f^+ (x^0, x^1), \nn T_{01}
= +T_{10}  &=& {\cal T}_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi /2) \,
{\rm Im} f^+(x^0, x^1), \nn T_{ii} &=&-\cT_{25}||f^+(x^0,x^1)||^2
\qquad ({\rm for}~~~i=2,3,\cdots,25). \label{em-components} \

\begin{eqnarray} \langle E \rangle (x^0) &:=& {1 \over 2\sqrt{2} \pi}
\int_0^{2\sqrt{2}\pi}dx^1 \, T_{00} (x^0,x^1) =\left\{
\begin{array}{ccc} 0 & {\rm for} & \vert x^0 \vert > x_c^0 \\
{\cal T}_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) & {\rm for} & \vert x^0 \vert < x_c^0
\end{array} \right. .
% \nn P &=& {1 \over 2 \pi} \int_0^{2 \pi} \d y \,
%T_{01} (x^0, \sqrt{2} y). \nonumber
\nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} H_{00} + i H_{01} = -H_{11}+i H_{10}=
 f^+ h_1^- \ . \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray} f^+ h_1^- = 2 \cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2) \left[1- 2
\sin (\widetilde{\lambda} \pi /2) \cosh {(x^0 - i x^1) \over
\sqrt{2}} \right] f^+ - \vert \vert f^+\vert\vert^2 \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} F^e(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} F(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn
G^e_{ab}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1} G
\Lambda \right)_{ab} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn
%
H^e_{ab}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1} H
\Lambda \right)_{ab} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn
%
I^e_{abcd}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} \left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1}
\left( {}^t \Lambda^{-1} I \Lambda \right)_{ac} \Lambda
\right)_{bd} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} F^e(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} F (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \nn &=&
\gamma^{-1} \vert\vert f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\vert\vert^2, \nn
%
G^e_{00}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma \left[G_{00}(\gamma^{-1} y^0,y^1) -
e^2 G_{22}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \right] \nn &=& - \gamma^{-1}
\vert\vert f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\vert\vert^2 + \, 2 \gamma
 \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda \pi /2)\, {\rm Re} f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0, y^1),
\nn
%
G^e_{11} (y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} G_{11}(\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1)\nn &=&+\gamma^{-1} \vert \vert f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)
\vert\vert^2 - 2 \gamma^{-1}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda \pi/2) \, {\rm Re}
f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
 G^e_{22}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma
\left[G_{22}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) - e^2 G_{00}(\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1) \right] \nn &=& - \gamma^{-1} \vert\vert f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0,
y^1)\vert\vert^2 - 2 \gamma e^2 \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \, {\rm Re}
f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0, y^1), \nn
%
G^e_{ii}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} G_{ii} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\nn
&=& -\gamma^{-1} \vert \vert f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \vert\vert^2
\qquad ({\rm for}~~~ i = 3, \cdots, 25),
 \nn
%
G^e_{02}(y^0, y^1) = - G^e_{20}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma e \left[
G_{00} (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) - G_{22}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)
\right] \nn &=& 2 \gamma e \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda \pi/2 ) \, {\rm Re}
f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
 G^e_{01}(y^0, y^1) = + G^e_{10}(y^0,
y^1) &=& \, G_{01}(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) = \,\, 2
\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \, {\rm Im} f^+(\gamma^{-1}y^0, y^1), \nonumber
\nn
%
G^e_{12}(y^0, y^1) = - G^e_{21}(y^0, y^1) &=& e G_{01}(\gamma^{-1}
y^0, y^1) = 2e\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \, {\rm Im} f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} H_{00}^e(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma \left[ H_{00} - e^2 H_{22}
\right] = +\gamma \left[{\rm Re} (f^+ h_1^-) + e^2 \vert \vert f^+
\vert \vert^2 \right](\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{11}(y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} H_{11} = - \gamma^{-1} {\rm Re}
(f^+ h_1^-)(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{22} (y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma \left[ H_{22} - e^2 H_{00} \right]
= -\gamma \left[e^2 {\rm Re} (f^+ h_1^-) + \vert \vert f^+ \vert
\vert^2 \right] (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1),\nn
%
H_{ii}^e (y^0, y^1) &=& \gamma^{-1} H_{ii} =
-\gamma^{-1} \vert \vert f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)\vert \vert^2
\qquad ({\rm for}~~~i = 3, \cdots, 25), \nn
%
H^e_{01}(y^0, y^1) = + H^e_{10}(y^0, y^1) &=& \, H_{01} = \,\,
{\rm Im} (f^+ h_1^-)(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{12}(y^0, y^1) = - H^e_{21}(y^0, y^1) &=& e H_{01} = e\, {\rm
Im} (f^+ h_1^-)(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
H^e_{02}(y^0, y^1) = - H^e_{20}(y^0, y^1) &=& e \gamma
\left[H_{00} - H_{22} \right] = e \gamma \left[ {\rm Re} (f^+
h_1^-) + \vert \vert f^+ \vert \vert^2 \right](\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1) \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} T^e_{ab}(y^0, y^1) = {{\cal T}_{25} \over 2} \left(
G^e_{(ab)}(y^0, y^1) - \eta_{ab} F^e (y^0, y^1) \right), \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray} T^e_{00}(y^0, y^1) &=& + \, {\cal T}_{25} \gamma \,
\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2 ) \, {\rm Re} f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1),
\nn
%
T^e_{01} (y^0, y^1) &=& +{\cal T}_{25} \cos^2 (\widetilde{\lambda}
\pi/2)\, {\rm Im} f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1), \nn
%
T^e_{11} (y^0, y^1) &=& - {\cal T}_{25} \gamma^{-1}
\cos^2(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2)\, {\rm Re} f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0,
y^1), \nn
%
T^e_{22} (y^0, y^1) &=& - {\cal T}_{25} e^2 \gamma \cos^2
(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2) \, {\rm Re} f^+ (\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)
- {\cal T}_{25} \gamma^{-1}
|| f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) ||^2, \nn
%
T^e_{ii} (y^0, y^1) &=& -{\cal T}_{25}\gamma^{-1}
||f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1)||^2 \qquad
({\rm for}~~~ i = 3, \cdots, 25).
\label{Te}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 {\cal Q}_{[02]}(y^0, y^1) &=& {\cal T}_{25} \gamma e \cos^2(
\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2) \, {\rm Re} f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1),
\nn
%
{\cal Q}_{[12]} (y^0, y^1) &=& {\cal T}_{25} \, e  \cos^2
(\widetilde{\lambda} \pi/2) \, {\rm Im} f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1).
\label{Qe}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\rm Re} f^\pm(\gamma^{-1}y^0,y^1)
% {1 \over 2} \left[ f^+(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) + f^-
%(\gamma^{-1} y^0, y^1) \right]
\rightarrow \left\{
\begin{array}{ccc}
 2\sqrt{2}\pi \sum_{n\in\Z}\delta\left(y^1 -\sqrt{2} (2n+1) \pi\right) &
{\rm for} & \vert y^0 \vert < y^0_c,\\
%4 \pi \delta(y^1)  & {\rm for} & \vert y^0 \vert < y^0_c,
%\,\,\, \widetilde{\lambda} \rightarrow - 1 \\
0 & {\rm for} & \vert y^0 \vert > y^0_c. \end{array} \right.
\nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} T_{00}^{e+b}&=& + \cT_{25} \gamma \widetilde{\gamma} (1 +
b^2)\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\, {\rm Re}f^+,\nn
%
T_{01}^{e+b} &=& + \cT_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\left[{\rm Im}f^+ +
\gamma \wt\gamma eb\,{\rm Re}f^+ \right], \nn
%
T_{11}^{e+b} &=& - \cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\left[ \gamma
\widetilde{\gamma} (1 - e^2)\,{\rm Re}f^+ -{2eb \over (1 +
b^2)}\,{\rm Im} f^+ \right],\nn
%
 T^{e+b}_{22} &=&  + \cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)
\left[ \gamma \widetilde{\gamma} (b^2 - e^2) \,{\rm Re}f^+ + {2 eb
\over (1 + b^2)}\,{\rm Im}f^+ \right] - \cT_{25}
\gamma^{-1}\wt{\gamma}^{-1}|| f^+||^2,\nn
 T_{ii}^{e+b} &=& -\cT_{25}
\gamma^{-1} \wt{\gamma}^{-1} ||f^+ ||^2 \qquad \qquad ({\rm
for}~~~i = 3, \cdots, 25), \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} {\cal Q}_{[02]}^{e+b} &=& \cT_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \left[
\gamma \wt{\gamma} e \,{\rm Re}f^+ - b \,{\rm Im}f^+ \right], \nn
%
{\cal Q}_{[12]}^{e+b} &=& \cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \left[
 e \left({ 1 - b^2 \over 1+ b^2} \right)\,{\rm Im}f^+
+\gamma\wt{\gamma} b \,{\rm Re}f^+  \right], \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray} T_{00}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& \, \, \Gamma^2 \, \left( 2\sqrt{2}\pi
\wh E \, \delta (y^0, y^1) \right) \, = - \, \Gamma^2 \,
T_{22}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) \nn
%
T_{01}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=&\Gamma^2 \, V \left( 2\sqrt{2}\pi \wh E \,
\delta(y^0, y^1) \right) \, = \, V \, T_{00}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) \nn
%
T_{11}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& \Gamma^2 V^2 \left( 2\sqrt{2}\pi \wh E \,
\delta (y^0, y^1) \right) = V^2 T_{00}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) \nn
T^{e+b}_{22}(y^0, y^1) &=&-2\sqrt{2}\pi \wh E\, \delta (y^0, y^1) \nn
{\cal Q}_{[02]}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& 2\sqrt{2}\pi\wh E\,\Gamma\,\delta
(y^0, y^1)\nn {\cal Q}_{[12]}^{e+b}(y^0, y^1) &=& 2\sqrt{2}\pi\wh
EV\Gamma\,\delta (y^0, y^1) = V {\cal Q}^{e+b}_{[02]}(y^0, y^1) \
. \nonumber \

\begin{eqnarray}
T^{b}_{00}(y^0, y^1) &\simeq& +\cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\,b\,{\rm
Re}f^+(y^0, y^1)\nn
%
T^{b}_{01}(y^0, y^1)&\simeq& +\cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2) \,{\rm
Im}f^+(y^0, y^1)\nn
%
T^{b}_{11}(y^0, y^1) &\simeq& {\cal O}(b^{-1})\nn
%
T^{b}_{22}(y^0, y^1)&\simeq& +\cT_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\,b\,{\rm
Re}f^+(y^0, y^1) -\cT_{25}\, b\,||f^+||(y^0, y^1)\nn
%
T^{b}_{ii}(y^0, y^1)&\simeq& -\cT_{25}\, b\,||f^+||(y^0, y^1)\nn
%
\cQ^{b}_{[02]}(y^0, y^1)&\simeq&-\cT_{25}\cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\,b\,{\rm
Im}f^+(y^0, y^1)\nn
%
\cQ^{b}_{[12]}(y^0, y^1)&\simeq&+\cT_{25} \cos^2(\widetilde\lambda\pi/2)\, {\rm
Re}f^+(y^0, y^1),
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T_{00}&=&+\cT_p\,\gamma\, V(T)\l( \cF(z)+ 2\gamma^2 {\dot T}^2 \,
\cF'(z)\r),\nn T_{01}&=&+\cT_p\,\gamma\, V(T)\, 2 \dot T
T'\cF'(z),\nn T_{11}&=&-\cT_p\,\gamma^{-1}\,V(T)\l(
\cF(z)-2T'^2\cF'(z)\r),\nn T_{22}&=&-\cT_p\,e^2\gamma\,V(T)\l(
\cF(z)+ 2\gamma^2 {\dot T}^2 \, \cF'(z)\r)
-\cT_p\gamma^{-1}\,V(T)\cF(z),\nn
T_{ii}&=&-\cT_p\,\gamma^{-1}V(T)\cF(z), \qquad({\rm for}\quad
i=3,4,\dots,p), \label{effT}
